article.title: Pamulapati Appointed to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text: Jagadeesh Pamulapati has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the deputy director, Defense Laboratory Programs, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
